div.font:
EDUCATING GRADES 9-12
4 DAY SCHOOL WEEK
22 CREDITS TO GRADUATE
COME IN FOR A TOUR​
Matthew Weaver, School Leader | 4290 South Miller Road, Buckeye, AZ. 85326 | P (623) 386-6799 | F (623) 327-9636

td.div: Here at Skyview High School you will find caring, highly qualified teachers and staff who work to build a safe and positive learning environment that recognizes and award student success. ​We provide flexible scheduling, opportunities for credit recovery, and a balanced program of study that includes core and elective classes, on a Monday - Thursday schedule. Fridays are for credit recovery classes, tutoring, field trips, college tours, or clubs. Students can earn on-the-job experience through our work-credit, volunteer assistance and community service programs. Students can accelerate graduation by taking extra classes to earn up to 10 credits each year. Skyview High School can offer students experiences that will help them grow and achieve success. ​
